mapper.sql: id AS "id", turnover_id AS "turnoverId", lattice_code AS "latticeCode", goods_type AS "goodsType", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_id AS "materialId", material_type AS "materialType", material_name AS "materialName", material_sku AS "materialSku", m_unit AS "mUnit", material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_number AS "mNumber", create_time AS "createTime",lattice_state AS "latticeState",sizes AS "sizes"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id = #{paramCondition.id}
and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId}
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id = #{paramCondition.materialId}
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')

SELECT wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.id AS "id", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.turnover_id AS "turnoverId", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.lattice_code AS "latticeCode", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.goods_type AS "goodsType", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_id AS "materialId", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type AS "materialType", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_name AS "materialName", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_unit AS "mUnit", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_serial_number AS "materialSerialNumber", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_batch AS "mBatch", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.create_time AS "createTime", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.lattice_state AS "latticeState", wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.sizes as "sizes", wms_warehouse_turnover.barcode as "barcode", wms_material_type.plant as "plant" FROM (`wms_warehouse_turnover_bind` left join wms_warehouse_turnover on wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.turnover_id = wms_warehouse_turnover.id) LEFT join wms_material_type on wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type_id =wms_material_type.id where 1 = 1
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId}
and wms_warehouse_turnover.barcode = #{paramCondition.barcode}
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between DATE_FORMAT(#{paramCondition.startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{paramCondition.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')
and wms_material_type.plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1
and id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.id},'%')
and turnover_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.turnoverId},'%')
and lattice_code like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeCode},'%')
and goods_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.goodsType},'%')
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and material_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialId},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSerialNumber},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')
and m_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mNumber},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and lattice_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.latticeState},'%')

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId} limit 1

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.turnoverId}

select
from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1 = 1 and turnover_id = #{paramCondition.id}
select from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1=1 and material_sku = #{materialSku} order by id asc limit 1;

select * from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind AS wmb LEFT JOIN wms_warehouse_turnover AS wm ON wmb.`turnover_id` = wm.`id` where wm.`turnover_state` = '0' and wm.turnover_type = #{paramCondition.turnoverType} and wm.turnover_mouth_quantity = #{paramCondition.turnoverLatticeType}
select * from wms_warehouse_turnover_bind where 1=1 and material_serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{materialSerialNumber},'%')
SELECT m_batch AS mBatch, SUM(m_number) AS total, m_unit AS mUnit FROM `wms_warehouse_turnover_bind` WHERE material_sku = #{materialSku} GROUP BY m_batch HAVING total >= #{number} LIMIT 1

SELECT wms_material_type.plant as plant, wms_material_type.material_type as materialType, wms_material_type.material_sku as materialSku, wms_material_type.di_batchNo as mBatch, wms_material_type.m_unit as mUnit, wms_material_type.material_name as materialName, temp.material_type_id as materialTypeId, temp.mNumber as mNumber, temp.sizes as sizes, temp.boxNumber as boxNumber, temp.createTime as createTime FROM ( SELECT wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.material_type_id, wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.sizes as sizes, SUM(wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.m_number) as mNumber, MIN(wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.create_time) as createTime, COUNT(DISTINCT wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.turnover_id) as boxNumber FROM wms_warehouse_turnover_bind GROUP BY material_type_id HAVING material_type_id != '' ORDER BY MIN(wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.create_time) ASC ) AS temp LEFT JOIN wms_material_type ON temp.material_type_id = wms_material_type.id WHERE 1 = 1
and material_type_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialTypeId},'%')
and plant like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.plant},'%')
and material_type like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialType},'%')
and material_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialName},'%')
and material_sku like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.materialSku},'%')
and m_unit like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mUnit},'%')
and m_batch like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.mBatch},'%')

SELECT wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.*, wms_warehouse_turnover.barcode as barcode FROM `wms_warehouse_turnover_bind` inner join wms_warehouse_turnover on wms_warehouse_turnover_bind.turnover_id = wms_warehouse_turnover.id;
